item.title: Barrows Killcount Problem
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

Hey so ive been making real barrows for my allstar, its gonna turn out to be Identical to runescape’s except parts of the crypt, uhmm, ill show whats the problem.

theres no compiler errors in this code, its when i go to the coffin that takes me to the crypt it always sais :
“There Is A Tunnel In The Coffin, But You Are Not Ready To Explore It”
It Even sais that with 5 kill count, heres the code :

	public void MsgCrypt(client c, NPCHandler n) {
if (n.KillCount <= 4) {
c.sendMessage("There Is A Tunnel In The Coffin, But You Are Not Ready To Explore It");
} else {
c.sendQuest("--Barrows--", 2470);
c.sendQuest("You Search The Coffin And Find A Tunnel", 2471);
c.sendQuest("[Be Brave And Enter]", 2472);
c.sendQuest("[Leave It Alone]", 2473);
c.choose = 4;
c.sendFrame164(2469);
	}
  }

i need it to say :

c.sendQuest("--Barrows--", 2470);
c.sendQuest("You Search The Coffin And Find A Tunnel", 2471);
c.sendQuest("[Be Brave And Enter]", 2472);
c.sendQuest("[Leave It Alone]", 2473);

when you have the 5 killcount and when you have less it sais :
“There Is A Tunnel In The Coffin, But You Are Not Ready To Explore It”

IF you know how to fix my problem, please post :S

Read full topic
